title: Guilty Of Treason (1950, Biography) Behind the Iron Curtain: Courage changes history!

sources.title: Guilty Of Treason (1950, Biography) Behind the Iron Curtain: Courage changes history!
sources.description:
When Roman Catholic Cardinal Mindszenty (Charles Bickford) boldly defies the iron curtain's shadow, he finds himself caught in a high-stakes game of spiritual chess against ruthless Soviet officials. Meanwhile, brave teacher Stephanie Varna (Bonita Granville) and determined journalist Tom Kelly (Paul Kelly) dance with danger as they navigate a Budapest battleground where speaking truth becomes the ultimate act of rebellion!

Original title: Guilty Of Treason (1950) AKA: As We See Russia

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/Id05BS6g91o


Director: Felix E. Feist
Writers: Emmet Lavery, JÃ³zsef Cardinal Mindszenty
Actors: Charles Bickford, Bonita Granville, Paul Kelly
Genres: Biography, Drama, History, Religion, War
